original_title: Tell Me That You Love Me, Junie Moon
overview: Junie Moon is in the hospital after her face has been disfigured by her deranged boyfriend. There she meets two other patients â€” Arthur, an epileptic, and Warren, who is gay and uses a wheelchair. The unlikely trio of outcasts decides to move in together and manages to enjoy a series of adventures as they endure various forms of prejudice and struggle with their own issues.
title: Tell Me That You Love Me, Junie Moon
